message:
BLM thugs attacked whites in Milwaukee, Charlotte, and just two days ago two teen sisters were attacked in Stockton, CA by a BLM mob. Maybe it's time we started "protesting" every time there's an instance of black on white violence. This video will make you sick! 

Share if you're angry as hell & aren't going to take it anymore!
http://freedomdaily.com/white-men-set-on-fire-by-blacks-media-censored/
